alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone; Callaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 1:31AM CDT until July 13 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Boone County in central Missouri... Southwestern Audrain County in central Missouri... Northern Callaway County in central Missouri... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mexico, Auxvasse, Martinsburg, Murry, Shamrock, Williamsburg, Kingdom City, Benton City, and Hatton. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 144 and 155. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
